comments:
The plugin won't load, here is the stack trace:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 5020 Dez 04, 2003 18:35:33.326
!MESSAGE Launch configuration type id "org.eclipse.cdt.launch.localCLaunch" does
not exist.
Possible causes:
	Missing specification of a launch type (missing plug-in)
	Incorrect launch configuration XML
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 Dez 04, 2003 18:35:33.328
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI:
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Launch configuration type id
"org.eclipse.cdt.launch.localCLaunch" does not exist.
Possible causes:
	Missing specification of a launch type (missing plug-in)
	Incorrect launch configuration XML
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfigurationInfo.initializeFromXML(LaunchConfigurationInfo.java:384)

It looks like an installation problem.

What's the version/date of the drop

Reassign to Doug.

Alain, you're right, it was a installation problem. A clean new Eclipse M5
install loads the CDT plugin now. Sorry for the inconvenience.

traces.message: Launch configuration type id "org.eclipse.cdt.launch.localCLaunch" does not exist. Possible causes:  Missing specification of a launch type (missing plug-in)  Incorrect launch configuration XML
